titles.title: To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to allow a deduction for amounts contributed to a 529 plan.
To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to allow a deduction for amounts contributed to a 529 plan.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

bill.summary: This bill allows a tax deduction for contributions to a qualified tuition program (known as 529 plans) up to $10,000 in a taxable year. Taxpayers whose adjusted gross income exceeds $200,000 in a taxable year are not eligible for the deduction.
